Page.creator: Matthew T. Beitler, Joe D. Williams, Don Brutzman
Page.description: HAnim Specification reference example providing full coverage and visibility of all specified HAnim constructs, plus motion animations. Geometry visualizations are derived from HAnim1SpecificationLOA3Invisible.x3d visualization report. Resusable exemplar animations also added via heads-up display (HUD) interface to confirm proper parent-child relationships.

Page.title: HAnim 1 Specification LOA 3 Animation
Page.translator: Don Brutzman and Joe Williams
